PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-11772015-07-31,  ,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActCriminal Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Prescribing Certain Firearms and Other Weapons, Components and Parts of Weapons, Accessories, Cartridge Magazines, Ammunition and Projectiles as Prohibited or Restricted
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS PRESCRIBING CERTAIN FIREARMS AND OTHER WEAPONS, COMPONENTS AND PARTS OF WEAPONS, ACCESSORIES, CARTRIDGE MAGAZINES, AMMUNITION AND PROJECTILES AS PROHIBITED OR RESTRICTED in order to prescribe the firearms set out below as “restricted firearm” if they have a barrel of less than 470 mm in length, and “non-restricted firearm” if they have a barrel of at least 470 mm in length.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0213 Publication Date: 2015-08-12
AttachmentsAttachment
